section.title: Using a Separate NFS Server
section.para: This section tells how to set up NFS shares for secondary and (optionally) primary storage on an NFS server running on a separate node from the Management Server.
The exact commands for the following steps may vary depending on your operating system version.

warning.para: (KVM only) Ensure that no volume is already mounted at your NFS mount point.
